instruction.value: May give up to 5 doses per 24 hours.

additionalnotes.value: Recommended dosing for children 3 and up to 6 years of age: Maximum daily dose of 600 mg (5 doses of 120 mg). Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.

Recommended dosing for children 6 and up to 12 years of age: Maximum daily dose of 1625 mg (5 doses of 325 mg). Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.

Recommended dosing for children 12 years and older and adults: Maximum daily dose of 3900 mg (6 doses of 650 mg). Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.

maximumprndose.value: Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.
